#summary Sample code to test XION's compatibility with its immediate ancestor, HyperTalk.

= SampleCode - !WinklerTest =

This snippet of code is an example of obfuscated !HyperTalk code that was used to test XION's compatibility.

{{{
put empty into a
put "a b c" into item
put 1 into char
put 2 into word
if true then repeat with word char of item = char char to word of word char of char to word char to char of char char of word
	put a&&"HyperTalk is a bitch to parse
end repeat else beep
}}}

The correct output is:

{{{
1 "HyperTalk is a bitch to parse
2 "HyperTalk is a bitch to parse
}}}
